mapper.select: SELECT t_activity.*,user_nickname,avatar,IFNULL(comment_count,0) AS comment_count FROM t_activity LEFT JOIN t_user ON t_user.user_id=t_activity.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT activity_id,COUNT(activity_id) AS comment_count FROM t_activity_comment GROUP BY activity_id) as t ON t_activity.activity_id=t.activity_id

SELECT t_activity.*,user_nickname,avatar,IFNULL(comment_count,0) AS comment_count FROM t_activity LEFT JOIN t_user ON t_user.user_id=t_activity.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT activity_id,COUNT(activity_id) AS comment_count FROM t_activity_comment GROUP BY activity_id) as t ON t_activity.activity_id=t.activity_id where t_activity.activity_id=#{activityId}

SELECT t_activity_comment.*,user_nickname,avatar,IFNULL(reply_count,0) AS reply_count FROM t_activity_comment LEFT JOIN t_user ON t_user.user_id=t_activity_comment.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT comment_id,COUNT(comment_id) AS reply_count FROM t_activity_reply GROUP BY comment_id) as t ON t.comment_id=t_activity_comment.comment_id WHERE activity_id=#{activityId} ORDER BY t_activity_comment.comment_time
SELECT t_activity_reply.*,avatar FROM t_activity_reply LEFT JOIN t_user ON t_user.user_id=t_activity_reply.from_user_id WHERE t_activity_reply.comment_id=#{commentId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_activity SET look_count=look_count+1 WHERE activity_id=#{activityId}
